望.definition: full moon; to hope; to expect; to visit; to gaze (into the distance); to look towards; towards

望塵莫及.definition: lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom); to be far inferior

望夫石.definition: Amah Rock in Sha Tin 沙田[Sha1 tian2], Hong Kong

望奎.definition: Wangkui county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

望奎縣.definition: Wangkui county in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang

望女成鳳.definition: lit. to hope one's daughter becomes a phoenix (idiom); fig. to hope one's daughter is a success in life

望子成龍.definition: lit. to hope one's son becomes a dragon (idiom); fig. to long for one' s child to succeed in life; to have great hopes for one's offspring; to give one's child the best education as a career investment

望安.definition: Wangan township in Penghu county 澎湖縣|澎湖县[Peng2 hu2 xian4] (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan

望安鄉.definition: Wangan township in Penghu county 澎湖縣|澎湖县[Peng2 hu2 xian4] (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan

望文生義.definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning; a far-fetched interpretation

望族.definition: distinguished or prominent family; influential clan (old)

望日.definition: the full moon; the fifteenth day of each lunar month

望梅止渴.definition: lit. to quench one's thirst by thinking of plums (idiom); fig. to console oneself with illusions

望江.definition: Wangjiang, a county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

望江縣.definition: Wangjiang, a county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

望洋興嘆.definition: lit. to gaze at the ocean and lament one's inadequacy (idiom); fig. to feel powerless and incompetent (to perform a task)

望而卻步.definition: lit. to shrink back at the sight of (sth daunting) (idiom); fig. to be deterred

望花.definition: Wanghua district of Fushun city 撫順市|抚顺市, Liaoning

望花區.definition: Wanghua district of Fushun city 撫順市|抚顺市, Liaoning

望診.definition: (TCM) observation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]

望謨.definition: Wangmo county in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔西南州[Qian2 xi1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

望謨縣.definition: Wangmo county in Qianxinan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔西南州[Qian2 xi1 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

望都.definition: Wangdu county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

望都縣.definition: Wangdu county in Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

望風.definition: to be on the lookout; to keep watch

望風捕影.definition: see 捕風捉影|捕风捉影[bu3 feng1 zhuo1 ying3]

望風而逃.definition: to flee at the mere sight of (idiom)
